data.name: WelcomeMessage
data.value:
Welcome to the game: 'Enchanted Forest's Maze'!
Once upon a time there was a beautiful, magical and safe forest in Fairylandia (another land name) but an evil dark entity has cursed this town and turned this forest into a dark and frightening maze with traps intended to harm you and prevent you from ever escaping. So your mission is to find the exit (a star shining brightly waiting for you), however; be careful because on your path not only will you find malicious traps but you also need to compete with the other player. Even though two of you will start this adventure, only one will survive. Not all is doomed, because the queen and king are inside the maze with you both and they will help whenever you visit them. Oh I almost forgot! Theres an area in this forest unlike the others because the curse has made it invisible and if you land on it you will be teleported to somehwere random in the forest, so watch your step. Without further ado, good luck to you both and let the games begin!
